ibanez.jacob.cat.xtec.ioc.gallery.model

Interface MultimediaElementRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultimediaElementRepositorySqlLite

    public interface MultimediaElementRepository
    This interface provides a contract to communication between the presenter and the model of the application.
    Author:
    Jacob Ibáñez Sánchez.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MultimediaElementRepository.OnGalleryChangedListener
      This interface must be implemented by whatever class which wants to be notified when the gallery is modificated.

      • setGalleryChangedListener

        void setGalleryChangedListener(MultimediaElementRepository.OnGalleryChangedListener multimediaElementCreatedListener)
        Attaches a new listener to the model
        Parameters:
        multimediaElementCreatedListener - A class implementing MultimediaElementRepository.OnGalleryChangedListener

      • getMultimediaElementById

        MultimediaElement getMultimediaElementById(long id)
        Gets a single MultimediaElement by it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - The MultimediaElement identifier.
        Returns:
        The selected MultimediaElement or null if not found.

      • getGallery

        Gallery getGallery()
        Gets the collection of all MultimediaElements
        Returns:
        The Gallery containing the collection of MultimediaElements

      • addMultimediaElement

        void addMultimediaElement(MultimediaElement multimediaElement)
        Adds a new MultimediaElement to the Gallery.

        Each implementation has to deal with duplicates properly to ensure consistency.

        Parameters:
        multimediaElement - The MultimediaElement to be inserted.

      • removeMultimediaElementById

        void removeMultimediaElementById(long id)
        Removes a MultimediaElement from its Gallery.
        Parameters:
        id - he MultimediaElement identifier.
